channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KS

item.title: Report X-2024040007
item.description:
Report X-2024040007

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-03T15:11:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-25
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024040007 UNLOAD SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP. DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER TO THE LEAKER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKING PACKAGE. CONSULTED THE DECISOIN TREE ON HOW TO RESPOND TO THE LEAKER. FOLLOWING PROPER GUIDLINES IN THE BOOK THE RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER BROUGHT BACK THE LEAKER AND ALL CONTAIMNATED BOXES TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL. 2. X-2024040008 UNLOAD SUPERVISOR CALLED A LEAKER TO THE DMP. DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENCE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER CONSULTED WITH THE DECSION TREE ON HOW TO RESPOND TO THE LEAKER. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE GUIDLINES IN THE DECSION TREE TO CLEAN UP THE LEAKER. RESPONDER BROUGHT BACK THE LEAKER AND CONTAIMINATED PACKAGES BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2024031425
item.description:
Report X-2024031425

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-01T03:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-22
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A RESPONDER WAS DISPATCHED TO DOOR 337 ON PD8 FOR A LEAKING HAZMAT. UTILIZING ALL NECESSARY PPE AND DECISION TREE, THE RESPONDER PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED SPILL TUB. THEN BROUGHT THE PACKAGE TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PRECESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024031338
item.description:
Report X-2024031338

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-22
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While a package handler was unloading a trailer, he noticed that a package was leaking and he told his manger. DescribePack: the contents got loose cap and spilled out like one gallon in total. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The manage called QA, QA went to the area and clean the spilled and brought the packaged in a tote line with a hazmat bag.

item.title: Report X-2024031086
item.description:
Report X-2024031086

  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A LEAKING HAZMAT WAS FOUND ON THE UNLOAD AREA. THE RESPONDER REFERED TO THEIR DECISION TREE AND PLACED THE LEAKING PACKAGE IN A LINED SPILL TUB. CLEANED UP THE SPILL AND MOVED THE PACKAGE TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024031218
item.description:
Report X-2024031218

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-20
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024031218 SequenceEvent: MANAGER NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING ON THE IC BELTAND NOTIFIED QA. QA PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED TOTE AND THEN TOOK THE PACKAGE TO THE PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: ONE BOTTLE WAS LEAKING OUT FROM AROUND THE CAP AND SOILED THE BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE. 2. X-2024031268 SequenceEvent: MANAGER NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING IN THE CHUTE AND NOTIFIED QA. QA PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED TOTE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN TO THE PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: BOTH OF THE BOTTLES WERE LEAKING OUT FROM AROUND THE CAPS AND SOILED THE BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2024031139
item.description:
Report X-2024031139

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-15
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was discovered while unloading a trailer. It was reported to QA by the manager. It was recovered and brought to the processing cage. DescribePack: The liquids leaked through a loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The spill was cleaned with absorb-all and the package was placed in a tote with a liner.
